results.title: My wardrobe door
results.brief_description: Nadia Rose’s wardrobe door is full of photo’s of her friends and family. It keeps them close to her even when she is far away. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.
results.description: Nadia Rose’s wardrobe door is full of photo’s of her friends and family. It keeps them close to her even when she is far away. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: The old man
results.creator_credit: Koorie Heritage Trust and Lee Stewart
results.brief_description: Lee Stewart pays tribute to his father who coached the local football team and was an inspiration to his sons and his players. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.
results.description: Lee Stewart pays tribute to his father who coached the local football team and was an inspiration to his sons and his players. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.

results.title: Old and new
results.brief_description: In her house Karen Adams is surrounded by old and new things. Objects that she finds in op shops and on the beach. Things that remind her of home. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.
results.description: In her house Karen Adams is surrounded by old and new things. Objects that she finds in op shops and on the beach. Things that remind her of home. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: Waterholes : our turn
results.creator_credit: Kaye Munroe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Kaye Munroe remembers the day the devastating Gippsland bushfires came to her doorstep. The ‘travelling fingers’ of the bushfire threatened not only her home but the beauty of the area she loved. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kaye Munroe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Kaye Munroe remembers the day the devastating Gippsland bushfires came to her doorstep. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.

results.title: My nightmare has just begun
results.creator_credit: Linda Lord, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Linda Lord recounts the day the Gippsland bushfires came to her home. Despite undergoing fire training and preparation, when the fire front approached, there was no time to think. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Linda Lord, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Linda Lord recounts the day the Gippsland bushfires came to her home. Despite undergoing fire training and preparation, when the fire front approached, there was no time to think. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.
description_for_label: Linda Lord recounts the day the Gippsland bushfires came to her home. Despite undergoing fire training and preparation, when the fire front approached, there was no time to think. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.

results.title: Grateful angels
results.creator_credit: Roslyn Evans, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Grateful and Angels are Roslyn Evans’ treasured cows that she nearly lost in the Gippsland bushfires. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.

results.title: Floods through fire
results.creator_credit: Lynda Code, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Lynda Code recalls the hardships of living through the Gippsland bushfires then having to cope with devastating floods. Her story of resiliance is a tribute to her family, who have battled along with her. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and Latrobe City.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lynda Code, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Lynda Code recalls the hardships of living through the Gippsland bushfires then having to cope with devastating floods. Her story of resiliance is a tribute to her family, who have battled along with her. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and Latrobe City.
description_for_label: Lynda Code recalls the hardships of living through the Gippsland bushfires then having to cope with devastating floods. Her story of resiliance is a tribute to her family, who have battled along with her. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and Latrobe City.

results.title: My Dreaming
results.brief_description: If you don’t know where you come from how do you know how to go forward? Look into the past, at women who have gone. Have their stories also gone with them?
results.description: If you don’t know where you come from how do you know how to go forward? Look into the past, at women who have gone. Have their stories also gone with them?

results.title: Yorta Yorta: the river people of the Murray 'Tongola'
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and George Nelson
results.brief_description: Yorta Yorta descendant, George Nelson, talks about his great grandfather, Thomas James or as he was more fondly known as, grandpa james. An interesting history of Echuca, missionary life and Aboriginal culture and identity.
results.title_for_label: Yorta Yorta: the river people of the Murray ‘Tongola’
results.description: Yorta Yorta descendant, George Nelson, talks about his great grandfather, Thomas James or as he was more fondly known as, grandpa james. An interesting history of Echuca, missionary life and Aboriginal culture and identity.
